price: 32. Mpe nasala bolamu epai ya mama na ngai, mpe atiaki ngai nazala moto ya lolendo mpe moto ya pași te.
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَتِي وَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡنِي جَبَّارٗا شَقِيّٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidatī walam yajʿalnī jabbāran shaqiyyan
